channel.title: Weapon Shells appear infront of the player
channel.description:
As the title says, when you fire, the shells eject ahead of the player instead of directly to the side, you can see in the video below
This does not effect the 357 how ever, its shells after reloading appear to be fine.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mI4MCPizLYE&feature=youtu.be[/url]
